Introduction
This topic contains information on the responsibilities of the VSC or PMC for PFOPs, including
funds under VA hospital control
, and
accrued PFOP authorized by the VSC or PMC
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E  - Accrued Authorization and Notification
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section E
